column1: Section 17 of the Land Acquisition Act. This was to facilitate preliminary
preparations for her appeal by the Board of Review.
Subsequently, on 15.06.2020, the 5th Respondent, the Road Development
Authority,  informed  the  Petitioner  through  a  letter  (P22)  that  a  sum  of
Rs. 200,000/- had been deposited into her bank account, described as a
sum of money that had been 'retainedâ€™.
